title: The Night of No Tomorrow
description: The pupils find Merlin, he'll teach Presto Magic, if he stays with Merlin. Presto decides to stay. Presto attempts a spell to create a way home, but the spell summons dragons instead, and the dragon attack a nearby village.

title: Eye of the Beholder
description: The group encounters Sir John a seemingly fearless knight. But he's really a coward, his village is ready to exile him, unless he performs one brave deed. Venger captures, Sir John's son, and tells him to lead the group into a trap.

title: The Hall of Bones
description: Their mystic weapons start to fail them. Dungeon Master tells his pupils they need to be recharged in the Hall of Bones. But first they must find a guide to the Hall.

title: Valley of the Unicorns
description: The group encounters a unicorn being attacked. They manage to help the Unicorn, but Uni is captured by a wizard who is capturing Unicorns and stealing their magical horns. They must stop the wizard before he become even more powerful than Venger.

title: In Search of the Dungeon Master
description: Dungeon Master is captured by an evil lord working for Venger. The kids must find Dungeon Master and free him before it's too late.

title: Beauty and the Bogbeast
description: The kids learn of a magic river that can get them home. On their way to the river, however, Eric accidentally turns himself into an ugly bogbeast. The team must reverse the spell on Eric before the river's magic runs out.

title: Prison Without Walls
description: Venger enslaved a gnome village with a powerful spell. Only a gnome wizard Lukian can break the spell, but Venger had trapped Lukian in a most unusual prison.

title: Servant of Evil
description: Hank, Sheila, Presto, Eric, and Diana are captured by Venger and thrown into a volcanic prison. It's up to Bobby to save them, with some help from one of Venger's unwilling servants.

title: Quest of the Skeleton Warrior
description: A cursed knight named Dekion tricks the kids into retrieving a Circle of Power for Venger. The Circle can be used for good or evil, and it's up to Dekion to make that choice.

title: The Garden of Zinn
description: Bobby is bitten by a poisonous creature, and an antidote can only be found at the garden of queen Zinn. Will his friends be able to find it in time and convince the queen to give them the cure?

title: The Box
description: The kids accidentally find Zandora's Box, which can open doorways to many other places. This may be their best chance of getting home, but only Zandora herself knows how to use the box, and she is trapped somewhere inside it.

title: The Lost Children
description: The team encounters a band of children from another planet, whose spaceship might bring them all home. The only problem is that the ship is in Venger's hands.

title: P-R-E-S-T-O Spells Disaster
description: Presto accidentally transports his friends to a faraway place where they face an enormous danger (literally). Now he must climb to the new heights of courage and master his magic to save the others.

title: The Girl Who Dreamed Tomorrow
description: The adventurers meet a girl from their world who has accurate dreams of the future.

title: The Treasure of Tardos
description: The Realm is being destroyed by a horrible Demo-Dragon. The only weapon that can stop it is the Treasure of Tardos, but even if they get it the team will need a most unlikely ally.

title: City at the Edge of Midnight
description: The kids are adopted by a loving caravan leader who is searching for his daughter who was abducted by a demon.

title: The Traitor
description: Hank and Bobby are captured by orks. The others, with the help from their new friends - Cloud Bears - are trying to rescue Hank and Bobby, but to their horror discover that Hank has turned against them. Or has he?

title: Day of the Dungeon Master
description: Dungeon Master gives all his powers to Eric to teach him a lesson.

title: The Last Illusion
description: Presto falls for, and must help, a girl who can cast powerfully realistic illusions.

title: The Dragon's Graveyard
description: At the end of their patience with Venger ruining their attempts to return home, the kids resolve to bring the fight to him.

title: Child of the Stargazer
description: The city of Turad is ruled by a demon queen. According to an old prophecy, she will be defeated only by a child of a stargazer. The team is trying to fulfill the prophecy, but for them to succeed Diana will have to make a hard choice.

title: The Dungeon at the Heart of Dawn
description: Eric carelessly opens a magic box, thereby summoning the Ultimate Evil, which threatens to destroy everything. Even Dungeon Master is no match for it.

title: The Time Lost
description: Venger uses a time portal to change Earth's history. The team must stop him or they themselves may cease to exist.

title: Odyssey of the 12th Talisman
description: The kids meet Lorn - an orphan boy with a magic talisman - and invite him to join the team. But Lorn's talisman is more dangerous than any of them realizes.

title: Citadel of Shadow
description: Sheila saves a girl named Karina from a magic trap, but Karina turns evil. Meanwhile the kids are looking for a pair of magic rings that might send them home, not realizing that Karina has one of the rings.

title: Cave of the Fairie Dragons
description: The kids encounter a race of tiny friendly dragons, who are being hunted by an evil king. By saving the dragons they may find their way home.

title: The Winds of Darkness
description: A terrifying creature called The Darkling has been kidnapping people for a thousand years. A few more victims will give him the power to take over the entire Realm. The team must stop The Darkling, but he is too much for them.
